overview:
Marlene Camp

Investment Advisor Representative

Phone: 352-369-9726 Fax: 352-351-1687 Mobile Phone: 352-362-1573 E-mail: marlene.camp@mmcfinancial.com

Marlene was born and raised in Tewksbury, MA before moving to Ocala in 1985. She has a diversified background in the accounting field, leaving her position as Comptroller of a large family medical practice in Ocala to join MMC Financial Services. She received her Bachelor’s Degree from St. Leo University and is currently enrolled at “Boston University’s Boston Institute for Finance undertaking coursework for her C.F.P. designation.
